Clark Castner

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: H. S. Helms
  3. Location of Family: Madison, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Madison, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9
  7. Date of Birth: 1899-05-19, Geneva, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1917-05-25
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: Clark died following a hunting accident while living with the Helms Family in Atkinson, NE in 1917. See Obituary for Clark Castner on Find A Grave.
  11. Source: Madison Star-Mail, 27 November 1908.; Find-A-Grave for Clark Castner.
